text:
Odió is a single from José Rafael Cordero Sánchez's album Odió a Maduro. The single is composed as a parody song influenced by the original song Odió que no te odió by the Venezuelan singer Lasso.
The topic is dedicated to the President of Venezuela Nicolás Maduro and his wife Cilia Flores.
The song was released in August 2020 and does not yet have an official video clip.
